players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
You: "Diana, accusing Charlie so quickly seems risky. We need to consider all possibilities carefully to avoid lynching an innocent player."
You: "Charlie remaining silent after being accused could be suspicious, but we should give him a chance to explain before rushing to vote."
Diana: "Charlie is the only confirmed threat. Delaying his removal risks more town deaths. Alice, trust me on this—I'm the detective and my investigation is certain."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
